contents.projectsDescriptionPartTwo: , the purpose of Sapplink is to create applications developed fully in-house. Focused on and excelling in graphical/UX/UI design, system architecture planning, data flow organization, and app/web development, Sapplink is both a stand-alone freelancer creating its own products, and a contractor/consultancy available for hire.

clientelle.utefa: University of Toronto Engineers Finance Association

aboutPage.about: Born in Istanbul in 1998, Marc Atasoy is a Canadian 22 year oldsoftware developer studying in his fourth year at University of Toronto, acquiring his BASc. in Industrial Engineering.
